Data Privacy Handbook Utrecht University 2021-01-25 Preface Disclaimer: This is work in progress! The Data Privacy Handbook is being developed as a readable and practical resource for researchers and research support staff to address data privacy-related issues that come up during the research cycle.
The GDPR & Research Data This chapter may include sections on the legal basis for processing research data, reusing privacy-sensitive data (further processing), and data subjects rights.
